pr_title: OfferBook: Show min-max range for amount and volume

timeline.message:
OfferBook: Show min-max range for amount and volume

The OfferBook tables now show the amount and the volume as min-max range, where appropriate.

For the offers that have no range defined, the single values are shown.

Fixes #3129

OfferBook: Show min-max range for amount and volume

The OfferBook tables now show the amount and the volume as min-max range, where appropriate.

For the offers that have no range defined, the single values are shown.

Fixes #3129

timeline.bodyText: Is this comment really needed? Maybe naming renderCellContent() is enough as it is private method in very specific context.
timeline.author: ph-legacy
